website_summaries.verdict: A powerful yet compact lithium-ion cordless right angle drill.
pros: Variable speed paddle switch ensures precise drilling
Capable of delivering up to 1,800 RPM
Includes a side handle for extra control
cons: Not designed for extended everyday use or commercial applications

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to a Hitachi 18v Kit
customer_reviews.text: A good right angle drill at a great price. No one buys into a cordless system based on the right angle drill but if your into the Hitachi cordless system (which is getting to be on the extreme side of awesome lately) then this is a nice tool to have in your arsenal. It has a led light, it has a battery indicator, it comes with a handle and it drills at a right angle. Mine works as advertised. It's not a hole-hog for drilling 2" holes through 2x4's. Nor should it be used for mixing up batches of tile grout. But it's great for working in cabinets. NOTE: the new 3 and 6 Ah compact batteries are great!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Entin

customer_reviews.title: Variable Drill, but not a Driver
customer_reviews.text: I like that the battery is the same as my other Hitachi Drill/Driver so both drills can share the same battery/charger. It appears to be a quality variable speed drill, however, I wish it was also a Driver with torque settings like my other drill/driver and is why I only gave it a 4 rating.

product_meta.title: Hitachi DN18DSLP4 18 Volt Cordless Lithium-Ion 3/8-Inch Right Angle Drill (Tool Only, No Battery)
product_meta.description: Hitachi's 18-Volt Cordless 3/8" Right Angle Drill, the DN18DSLP4 is designed with the professional in mind. This angle drill has been designed to drill and drive into the tighter spaces that an ordinary drill would have trouble reaching. This tool is equipped with a 3/8" keyless chuck to accept a wide range of bits as well as enough torque to serve as a powerful solution to satisfy most driving and drilling needs. The DN18DSLP4 is also equipped with a built in LED light to illuminate the work piece, should it be used in a dark area. This tool will reach up to 1,800 RPM while also being equipped with a variable speed paddle switch for ultimate comfort and control to ensure more precision while in use. The DN18DSLP4 also includes a side handle for added control, a belt hook to keep the tool close at hand and a battery indicator to monitor the status and reduce down time. This item is available as a tool body only and is compatible with all Hitachi's 18V Li-Ion slide-type batteries (sold separately). Covered by Hitachi's unmatched Lifetime Li-Ion Tool Warranty, the DN18DSLP4 is sure to be an appreciated, ergonomic addition to anyone's tool collection.
